content: monica kennedy/crochet by monica the quick stitch was one of the very first stitches i learned to crochet it makes a great border on lots of projects or you can make whole projects out of it it resembles lattice work i think and i really love how quick and easy it is too i have done solids and various stripes but i really like this stripe pattern the bernat softee chunky yarn is awesome too - affordable and so soft and easy to work with enjoy bernat softee chunky yarn* 3 5 oz skeins 39119 denim heather - color a 3 5 oz skeins 39008 natural - color b 2 8 oz skeins 40012 nature s way - color c * or other brand bulky 5 yarn most yarns have an icon on the label that gives the size of yarn - you can also select a thinner yarn and adjust the hook size but the finished product will be a different size you can also play around with the yarns and hooks this works up well in a variety of choices finished measurements 36 x 40 hook 8 00 mm / l us or two sizes larger than needed for yarn see yarn label abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st stitch sts stitches beg beginning or begin repeat repeat decrease together space space round s round s yo yarn over special instructions joining with double_crochet -
